x="246.5" y="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-15" parent="1" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shape=mxgraph.basic.document" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="470" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="App.ts" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="50" x="120" y="810" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-17" parent="1" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shape=mxgraph.basic.document" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="130" width="450" x="120" y="670" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-18" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="myFragment.ts" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="87" x="120" y="640" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-19" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="export const <b style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204);">myFragment</b> = `<span style="white-space: pre;">fragment <b style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">fragmentFields</b> on Todo {</span><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	id</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	title</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	completed</span><br></span><div><span style="white-space: pre;">}</span>`;</div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="110" width="410" x="140" y="680" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-20" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="<div style="line-height: 170%;">import { gql } from "@apollo/client";<div style="line-height: 170%;">import { useQuery } from "@apollo/client/react";<br></div><div style="line-height: 170%;">import { myFragment } from "./myFragment";</div><div><br></div><div style="line-height: 170%;">const App = () =&gt; {</div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	const QUERY = gql`</span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	query GetTodo ($id: ID!) {</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getTodo (id: $id) {</span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b>...<span style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">fragmentFields</span></b></span><br></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b>${<span style="color: rgb(0, 102, 204);">myFragment</span>}</b></span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>`;</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	const { data } = useQuery(QUERY);</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	return (&lt;&gt; {data?.Todo?.title} &lt;/&gt;)</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 170%;">}</div><div><br></div><div style="line-height: 170%;">export default App;</div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="450" width="410" x="135" y="850" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-21" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontStyle=1" value="ApolloClientでのFragmentの利用" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="283.5" x="203.75" y="105" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-23" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=#0066CC;labelBackgroundColor=default;fontStyle=1" value="fragment文を持つ変数を埋め込む(テンプレート文字列)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="220" x="363" y="1080" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-24" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=#009900;labelBackgroundColor=default;fontStyle=1" value="fragment文で定義されているフラグメント名を指定" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="196" x="423" y="1010" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-25" edge="1" parent="1" source="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-20" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.549;exitY=0.422;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.25;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#009900;" target="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-24" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="380" y="850" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="430" y="800" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-26" edge="1" parent="1" source="uUDBLQko3tWcuVmphtAJ-20"
